casebody.data:
Sayeed Al SHEHAB and Fatima Yasmeen, Plaintiffs-Petitioners,
v.
NEW JERSEY TRANSIT CORP., P.O. Eduardo Gomez, Det. Marianna Tropeano and Capt. Andrew Keelan, Defendants,
and
P.O. Toni Cruz and Sgt. Dominic Imperiale, Defendants-Respondents. C-692 September Term 2017
080401 Supreme Court of New Jersey. March 14, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-004705-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
